meanings.definition: A technique used in metalworking to create a strong bond between two pieces of metal.
meanings.sent1: The welding technique used here ensures a durable connection between the metal parts.
meanings.sent2: Skilled workers were needed for the welding of the metal pieces.
meanings.sent3: The welding technique was so effective, it seemed like magic to onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was a welding of minds, bringing innovative ideas together.
meanings.sent5: The welding process required focus and precision to achieve a perfect bond.
